products.description: Suicide Silence is the fifth studio album, released in 2017.

products.name: Become the Hunter (CD)
products.description: Become the Hunter is the sixth studio album, released in 2020.

products.name: Remember... You Must Die (CD)
products.description: Latest album with intense themes and heavy sound, released in 2023.
